text:
Never heard of this game.
That track has a nice soothing atmosphere that not just suits Christmas. In fact, i wouldn't have guessed it's supposed to be a Christmas track if it wasn't stated in the title.
Although the chimes at the end make you think of a cold lit-up night in an old town with a church near by. But that's just my culturally biased mind thinking here :P
